summary: This document is a Bureau of Prisons count sheet and inmate roster from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on August 9, 2019. It records the official inmate count and roster for that date, which is significant as it is the day Jeffrey Epstein died in custody.

persons.name: Mersey
persons.context: Listed as an inmate with registration number 89673-053 in the hospital (HOSP) category on the inmate roster for August 9, 2019.

events.title: Daily Inmate Count at MCC New York
events.description: Routine official inmate count conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, recording census by housing unit.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: This is a prison administrative document dated August 9, 2019, the day Jeffrey Epstein died in custody at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
The document shows a routine inmate count and roster, listing four inmates by name (Mersey, Montas, Noboa, Weber) with their registration numbers and housing assignments.
The total inmate count recorded was 758, with 4 inmates noted as 'out' (likely for medical, court, or other reasons), resulting in a verified count of 754 inmates present.
The document includes multiple official count slips and forms, indicating standard prison administrative procedures were being followed on that date.
Jeffrey Epstein's name does not appear in this specific roster extract, though he was housed at this facility and died there on this date.
